title: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the remaining area after excluding the land under the Development Plan Roads /Reservation of public amenities shall be considered
clause_text: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the remaining area after excluding the land under the Development Plan Roads /Reservation of public amenities shall be considered.
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area
